Panzer::

She started to wake up. Her vision was returning.  She slowly opened 
her optics and notice two very large figures standing over her.  She 
rubbed her optics with her paws and looked at them again. Her vision 
was clear now. She saw the two dragons from earlier.  She tried to 
jump to her feet, but her hind feet didn't want to co-operate. She 
transformed into bot mode and stood there, on shakey legs. "Who are 
you? Why did you attack me? I didn't attack you? You know, that 
wasn't very nice."  She drew her sidearm, but kept it at her side. If 
they hadn't killed her by now, then they must have a reason for 
keeping her alive. "Would you please explain to me what is going on?"
